mapper.sql: id, no, name, age, create_time, update_time
mapper.insert:
insert into user
id,
no,
name,
age,
create_time,
update_time,
#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{no,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{age,jdbcType=SMALLINT},
#{createTime,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{updateTime,jdbcType=INTEGER},
mapper.update:
update user
no = #{no,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
age = #{age,jdbcType=SMALLINT},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=INTEGER},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update user set no = #{no,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, age = #{age,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
